title: Implement core video upload and feed features

requirements.summary: Create video upload interface with progress tracking
acceptanceCriteria: User can select video files from their device
Upload completes successfully and provides feedback

file_operations.description: Create video upload component with file input, progress bar, and upload handling. Use the blob-storage component's ExternalBlob.fromBytes() and withUploadProgress() to handle video file uploads with progress tracking. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Call backend.addVideo() to persist uploaded videos with generated unique IDs and video metadata.
Wire VideoUpload component into the main application layout, making it accessible to users for uploading videos.

requirements.summary: Create video feed with thumbnail previews
acceptanceCriteria: Feed displays all uploaded videos in a grid or list layout
Each video shows a thumbnail preview
Videos are clickable to view full content

file_operations.description: Create video feed component that fetches all videos using backend.getAllVideos() and displays them in a responsive grid layout. Each video item should show thumbnail preview using the blob-storage component's ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() method for efficient streaming and caching. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Make videos clickable to navigate to playback view.
Create reusable video card component for displaying individual video items with thumbnail preview, title, and metadata. Use ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() to render video thumbnails efficiently.
Wire VideoFeed component into the main application layout and add routing to enable navigation between feed and playback views.

requirements.summary: Implement video playback with standard controls
acceptanceCriteria: Videos play when selected from the feed
Standard video controls are available and functional
Video player is responsive and handles different screen sizes

file_operations.description: Create video player component with standard HTML5 video controls (play, pause, seek, volume). Fetch video data using backend.getVideo() and render video using the blob-storage component's ExternalBlob.getDirectURL() method for streaming playback. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing. Ensure responsive design for different screen sizes.
Create video playback page that wraps the VideoPlayer component and handles video ID routing parameter. Display video metadata alongside the player.
Add route for video playback page with dynamic video ID parameter, enabling navigation from video feed to full playback view.

requirements.summary: Apply Nexustube branding with red, yellow-orange, and dark gradient neon aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Primary red color is used for key UI elements and branding
Secondary yellow-orange color is used for accents and highlights
Dark gradient background with neon aesthetic is applied throughout the app
Color scheme creates a cohesive, modern visual identity

file_operations.description: Extend Tailwind theme with Nexustube brand colors: primary red (#FF0000), secondary yellow-orange (#FFC00E), and custom dark gradient utilities for neon aesthetic. Add custom color tokens for consistent brand identity.
Apply dark gradient background with neon vibe to the root application element using CSS custom properties and gradients. Ensure background creates modern, cohesive visual identity throughout the app.
Apply Nexustube branding colors to main layout elements, navigation, and key UI components using Tailwind utility classes with the new brand color tokens.
